data-fm-content="9221603"><div class="flex-card"><div class="flex-content"><div class="flex-area-primary"><h2 class="itemHeading title-main">Virginia Beach, Norfolk - Virginia Beach Hotel Information</h2><div class="flex-app-content"><p>From the budget level to the more exclusive, Virginia Beach has a wide selection of comfortable hotel options. If you would like to stay within a 0.1-mile distance of the heart of Virginia Beach, Expedia's comprehensive database contains at least 82 places to base yourself in that area.</p><p>The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Knights-Inn-Virginia-Beach-Lynnhaven.h6604.Hotel-Information">Knights Inn Virginia Beach Lynnhaven</a>, is a great option for travelers as it's the most centrally located hotel choice in Virginia Beach.</p><p>The Virginia Beach area has a number of economical accommodation options that will be sure to satisfy budget-minded travelers. The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Oceanfront-Inn.h2094819.Hotel-Information">Oceanfront Inn</a> is 5 miles from the main part of Virginia Beach, while the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Schooner-Inn.h1711317.Hotel-Information">Schooner Inn</a> is 5 miles away. Other budget options in Virginia Beach are the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Courtyard-By-Marriott-Virginia-Beach-Norfolk.h14715.Hotel-Information">Courtyard by Marriott Virginia Beach Norfolk</a> and the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Quality-Inn-Suites-Oceanfront.h448470.Hotel-Information">Quality Inn & Suites Oceanfront</a>.</p><p>You could also check out the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Church-Point-Manor.h5186893.Hotel-Information">Church Point Manor</a> and the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Hilton-Virginia-Beach-Oceanfront.h1155964.Hotel-Information">Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront</a>. The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Church-Point-Manor.h5186893.Hotel-Information">Church Point Manor</a> is positioned 6 miles from the middle of Virginia Beach. The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Hilton-Virginia-Beach-Oceanfront.h1155964.Hotel-Information">Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront</a>, is located 5 miles away. Alternative hotels are the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Courtyard-By-Marriott-Virginia-Beach-Oceanfront-South.h202188.Hotel-Information">Courtyard by Marriott Virginia Beach Oceanfront South</a> and the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Holiday-Inn-Suites-Virginia-Beach-North-Beach.h16268.Hotel-Information">Holiday Inn & Suites Virginia Beach North Beach</a>.</p><p>After you have enjoyed Virginia Beach, set out soak up the wider region of the Coastal Virginia area. Coastal Virginia is marked by beaches and coastal plains, and commonly visited Coastal Virginia destinations include history museums. Travelers in this section of United States of America enjoy hiking.</p><p>30 miles from Virginia Beach is Suffolk, where you can spend the day enjoying Planters Peanut Center and Suffolk Visitor Center. The <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Suffolk-Hotels-Hilton-Garden-Inn-Suffolk-Riverfront.h1172221.Hotel-Information">Hilton Garden Inn Suffolk Riverfront</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Suffolk-Hotels-Holiday-Inn-Express-Hotel-Suites-Suffolk.h1777626.Hotel-Information">Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Suffolk</a> are just some of the accommodation options in Suffolk. Alternatively, you could stay in Portsmouth, 13 miles to the west of Virginia Beach, where you can choose from the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Norfolk-Waterside-Marriott.h14905.Hotel-Information">Norfolk Waterside Marriott</a> and <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Residence-Inn-Norfolk-Downtown.h2480303.Hotel-Information">Residence Inn Norfolk Downtown</a>. The Children's Museum of Virginia and Portsmouth Naval Shipyard Museum are a couple of the most popular places to see when visiting Portsmouth.</p><p>Norfolk International Airport is a logical airport for arriving in Virginia Beach. It is 10 miles away. If you would like to stay nearby, try the <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Residence-Inn-By-Marriott-Norfolk-Airport.h1066422.Hotel-Information">Residence Inn by Marriott Norfolk Airport</a> or <a href="https://www.expedia.com/Norfolk-Virginia-Beach-Hotels-Best-Western-Plus-Holiday-Sands-Inn-Suites.h791555.Hotel-Information">Best Western Plus Holiday Sands Inn & Suites</a>.</p><p></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></section><section class="flex-module links" id="links-5" data-fm="217457" data-fm-title-id=""><div class="box  "><header class="box-title"><h2 class="title-main">Hotels Close to Norfolk - Virginia Beach, Virginia</h2></header><div class="wrapper-toggle"><ul id="links-container-links-5" class="columnar-list columnar-list-spacious wrapper-toggle "><li data-name="Sandbridge Hotels"><a href="/Sandbridge-Virginia-Beach-Hotels.0-n553248629888458491-0.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels" data-track="flex.hotel.Travel-Guide-Filter-Hotels.links-5" data-track-events="event151">                                             Sandbridge Hotels                                     </a></li></ul></div></div></section><hr class="separator simple"  id="separator-2" />

If you would like to stay within a 0.1-mile distance of the heart of Virginia Beach, Expedia's comprehensive database contains at least 82 places to base yourself in that area. The Knights Inn Virginia Beach Lynnhaven , is a great option for travelers as it's the most centrally located hotel choice in Virginia Beach. The Virginia Beach area has a number of economical accommodation options that will be sure to satisfy budget-minded travelers. The Oceanfront Inn is 5 miles from the main part of Virginia Beach, while the Schooner Inn is 5 miles away. Other budget options in Virginia Beach are the Courtyard by Marriott Virginia Beach Norfolk and the Quality Inn & Suites Oceanfront . You could also check out the Church Point Manor and the Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront . The Church Point Manor is positioned 6 miles from the middle of Virginia Beach. The Hilton Virginia Beach Oceanfront , is located 5 miles away. Alternative hotels are the Courtyard by Marriott Virginia Beach Oceanfront South and the Holiday Inn & Suites Virginia Beach North Beach . After you have enjoyed Virginia Beach, set out soak up the wider region of the Coastal Virginia area. Coastal Virginia is marked by beaches and coastal plains, and commonly visited Coastal Virginia destinations include history museums. Travelers in this section of United States of America enjoy hiking. 30 miles from Virginia Beach is Suffolk, where you can spend the day enjoying Planters Peanut Center and Suffolk Visitor Center. The Hilton Garden Inn Suffolk Riverfront and Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Suffolk are just some of the accommodation options in Suffolk. Alternatively, you could stay in Portsmouth, 13 miles to the west of Virginia Beach, where you can choose from the Norfolk Waterside Marriott and Residence Inn Norfolk Downtown . The Children's Museum of Virginia and Portsmouth Naval Shipyard Museum are a couple of the most popular places to see when visiting Portsmouth. Norfolk International Airport is a logical airport for arriving in Virginia Beach. It is 10 miles away. If you would like to stay nearby, try the Residence Inn by Marriott Norfolk Airport or Best Western Plus Holiday Sands Inn & Suites . Sandbridge Hotels Want double Expedia+ points? Book with the App!
